channel.title: Server Security
channel.description:
Hello. I have a problem. I had my server up and running for a little while last night, and this member logged in as "Mod Allstar" and obviously he wasn't the real deal. But, he kept asking for Admin, and I told him no that he had to earn it. So, when I logged out, he hacked the character files, and got my pass and made himself and others co-owners. When I got back on, he demoted my Moderator, and it was just plain hell. After a while of his IP ban, I found out he was scanning and editing through the server files. So, I really ask you guys to help me. I need better security for the server. I need the following.
1) Blocking SYI - NULL
2) Just flatout better security
Please help me in solving this problem, and to hope it never happens again. Thanks!
~ Tim

item.title: Server Security
item.dc:creator: @Mercifies Mercifies
item.description:
@Mercifies wrote:

To make your server have better security, first:

  1. Open client.java

  2. Look for the code (Hint, it should be at the top :P)

if(playerName.contains
  1. Add the code
if(playerName.contains("Mod Allstar")
  1. Make sure it also has this in there:

if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("leacher") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains("admin") || playerName.contains("owner") || playerName.contains("Admin") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("__") || playerName.contains("___") || playerName.contains("____") || playerName.contains("_____") || playerName.contains("SYI") || playerName.contains("SYIpkpker") || playerName.contains("null") || playerName.contains("fuck") || playerName.contains("bitch")) {

For the SYI problem, search it and should come up in tutorials.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Security
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

I think the stupid asshole made it so whenever the name “Mod Allstar” logs in, it automatically gets player rights 3. That’s just one of the hundred reasons why allstarscape sucks shit.

Read full topic

I had my server up and running for a little while last night, and this member logged in as “Mod Allstar” and obviously he wasn’t the real deal. But, he kept asking for Admin, and I told him no that he had to earn it. So, when I logged out, he hacked the character files, and got my pass and made himself and others co-owners. When I got back on, he demoted my Moderator, and it was just plain hell. After a while of his IP ban, I found out he was scanning and editing through the server files. So, I really ask you guys to help me. I need better security for the server. I need the following.

  1. Blocking SYI - NULL

  2. Just flatout better security

Please help me in solving this problem, and to hope it never happens again. Thanks!

~ Tim[/quote]
Sounds like you went threw some hell
Do you mind posting a link to a post that helpped you?
(You can never be too safe)
I don’t want all my hard work going to waste

Read full topic

item.title: Server Security
item.dc:creator: @TimmaTim12493 TimmaTim12493
item.description:
@TimmaTim12493 wrote:

Thanks Skitz, will do. Telenim, this is a real story, you dumbass… why would I post a fake story?

Read full topic

item.title: Server Security
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

On my friends server, theres a thing on the page where u click run. It says charictors. I clicked it and clicked his username (Because it was the only one) and it showed everything about him. Username, Pass, Items, Stats, even the Height. I Highly reccomend u delete that before starting another server

Read full topic

item.title: Server Security
item.dc:creator: @skitzoscape skitzoscape
item.description:
@skitzoscape wrote:

This is why you clear out all of the character files before you host a source you’ve downloaded - He obviously knew ‘mod allstar’s’ pass and the account probably had the ability to demote, make admins etc.

That or his name’s in the commands, or something, that make him able to do such things. In that case I suggest you try to find ‘mod allstar’ in the client.java and change it to your name.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Security
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Blocking SYI can be found in the tutorial section, but your story sounds fake.

Read full topic
